docs.text: Please use the language switcher to choose the language you are comfortable with.

docs.title: Apply
docs.text:
Thanks for the interest! This is my first time making a model for distribution, so I would not recommend anyone new to MMD to try it. IT WOULD BE PAINFUL.

Due to the complexity of MMD and vtuber fanart culture, I have to verify a few things before giving out the model.

Info

By applying and downloading, you agreed to the Term of Use.

docs.title: Required info
docs.text:
1. a public Twitter account
    • protected account could not be added to the list per twitter limitation
  2. a link of your MMD video/image
    • must be published on either public media website(e.g. niconico/youtube/twitter, etc.) that did not violate any rights and rules and truly belongs to you (e.g. it has your twitter account somewhere in description or so)
  3. a link to VOD or clip that mentioned NijiEN member you like
  4. a link to the bowroll profile you would use to download the file

docs.title: Contact
docs.text:
1. through Privatter
  2. DM me directly on twitter

Twitter DM problem

Currently, DM people who do not follow each other may cause a ban.

Once your eligibility is confirmed, your account would be added to a Twitter list, which includes the link to the download instructions.

docs.title: Changelog
docs.text: All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file. Version naming based on Semantic Versioning and keep a changelog

docs.title: Changed
docs.text:
• Mesh
    • face
      • changed eye position, eyeball is now sphere-shaped, polished the profile and cheek, improved face texture, added nose shadow, redone eyelashes
    • hair
      • improved top-down view, also added details to the bang
  • Material
    • hood_string　wrong name wrong vertices
    • protector_belt　wrong name wrong vertices
    • also moved UV of sunglasses (should look the same)
  • Morph
    • eyes
      • redone

docs.title: Added
docs.text:
• Mesh
    • face
      • added transparent lens to the eyes
  • Morph
    • eye
      • heart_eye
      • kirakira_eye
    • brow
      • UP
      • DOWN
    • mouth
      • 舌伸び longer tongue
    • etc
      • both coat_sleeves_shorten, left, right
        • please use it when the coat sleeve is penetrating when arm bended
  • Display frame
    • I totally forgot this so I just added everything other than physics bones
  • Physics
    • added physics to the earring

docs.title: Fixed
docs.text:
• コート物理　fixed by Huiyi_iii (twitter@IiiHuiyi)
  • Huiyi_iii helped to improve the physics for the coat physics again, and the splitted part of coat now move seperately!

docs.title: Added
docs.text:
• ❗❗「スフィアマップ」 by (twitter@IiiHuiyi)
  • added a few morph for turning off the sphere maps, model may look different by default, please check the readme for details

docs.title: Fixed
docs.text:
• ズボンのウェイト　reported by (twitter@tadanemui1
  • pants would no longer stick out when you use center bone to crouch all the way
  • コート物理　fixed by (twitter@IiiHuiyi)
  • new version is much softer and beautiful and less penetration now, thanks twitter@IiiHuiyi for the help!
  • 「モーフ：コートなし」
  • なんか外すのをまた忘れたので外した

docs.title: Changed
docs.text:
• 「モーフ：まばたき」
  • eyes should move with the lid when blinking

docs.title: Changed
docs.text:
• 「モーフ：コートなし」
  • 脫外套的時候忘記脫的護甲會脫掉了
  • the protector now remove with the coat

docs.title: Added
docs.text: • First release

docs.title: Download
docs.text:
Note

Make sure you log in with the twitter account in your application to view the content!

  • Current version: v2.0.0
  • Last updated: 20230302
  • Bowroll

docs.title: v1.1.0
docs.text:
• from v1.1.0, sphere map would be on by default. If you want it turn it off, please use those morph with "SPHOFF" at the end.
  • SPHOFF：コート、パーカー、ズボン、プロテクター

docs.title: v1.0.0
docs.text:
• Use 「morph：背中凹ませ」to fix the penetration on the back, it is recommeneded to keep it on when you have the coat on.
  • Use 「morph：コートなし」to take off the coat, don't forget to turn off 「morph：背中凹ませ」
  • morph with "AL" in the name means you can use MME's AutoLumious4 to make it glow

docs.title: Known issues
docs.text: • with MME on there are some weird shadow around the armpit area on the coat, I don't know how to fix it, if you really hate it you can turn off MME. Seems like to be problem with HgSpotlight, may want to avoid using it together

docs.title: Disclaimer
docs.text:
You agree that your use of the services is at your sole risk. I am not liable for any indirect, incidental, consequential, special or damages of any kind whatsoever.

The model may become unavailable or forbid future use without advance notice

docs.title: Term of Use
docs.text:
• Follow the ANYCOLOR - Guidelines for Secondary Creation
  • Besides the correct art tag, add the hashtag「#にじさんじMMD」and「#NijisanjiMMD」when you publish
for the model itself ✔️/❌ Commercial use ❌ Use as an avatar or impersonation (e.g. VRChat) ❌ Use with the liver's voice without permission ❌ things that violate the liver's rule (e.g. certain shipping rule) ❌ Use with a ripped model or motion ❌ Redistribution ❌ Modification1 ✔️ Render with other software (e.g. blender) ✔️ Most other things I didn't say no ✔️

  1. If you mod the model and want to share with others, contact me! I definitely want to see more facial expression, accessories, or even a yamiban version! ↩
